sections.PURPOSE:
of this operation is to increase leader proficiency on deliberate attacks, asset management, and synchronized movement to set the conditions for success during Squad LFX.
TRAINING OBJECTIVES:
Reference ADP 7-0
Conduct a Chance Contact
Conduct an Attack
Conduct Support by Fire Conduct a Rehearsal React to unmanned aircraft system while dismounted Conduct Troop Leading Procedures and issue FRAGO
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Phase I: Planning and Prep - CONOP/DRAW , Supply requests / ROZ , Troop Briefing , Rehearsals , Land Request
Phase II: Movement and Occupation - Set Up , Safety Brief , Ammo Drop , TLPs , Night Ops Phase III:
sections.EXECUTION:
and Lane Validation - Safety Brief , Day Iteration, Night Iteration, Police Call, PB Ops
Phase IV: Clean Up - Range tear down and clean Up, Ammo Pick Up , Movement , Day 0 recovery
sections.TASKS:
TO SUBS:
Reference ADP 5-0 (2-18)
OIC: LT Eckstrom
NCOIC: SFC Murphy
RSO: 1SG Digby
Patrol Graders: PLs and PSGs
Ammo NCO: SGT Kuhn / SGT Hart
Ammo Detail: 3x SPC/PV2s
Chow: SGT Gonzales (HQ)
Casevac: TBD
CORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
Reference ADP 5-0 (3-12)
- Squad leaders will ensure their squads have conducted PCC/PCIs before SP. - Stryker Crews will ensure all recovery equipment is on truck prior to SP
sections.COMMAND AND SIGNAL:
P: TSM
A: FM

E: Signal
OIC: 2LT Eckstrom, Ian +49 15120631855
RSO: SFC Murphy, Sean Range Control DSN: 599-1200
RZ India

Lane Breakdown AO Adder
3
Scheme of Maneuver: (Both Iterations)
SUAS used to deter OP engagement and locate OBJ
Establish SBF
Determine Assault Positions
Engage Enemy IVO NAI
Destroy Enemy IVO NAI
Posture for Defense on NAI
1
2
3
4
5
6
Comments: Integration of UAS not just a novelty
Lane is designed to be a longer movement without trucks (~1K)
Lane Breakdown AO Boomslang
4
Scheme of Maneuver: (Both Iterations)​
Conduct VDO
React to Red UAS Assets (Coordinates Red Fires)​
Conduct Deliberate LDA Crossing
Establish SBF​
Determine Assault Positions​
Engage Enemy IVO NAI​
Destroy Enemy IVO NAI​
Posture for Defense on NAI
3
Comments: Deliberate LDA crossing due to perceived OP location
Lane utilizes trucks for continuity and VDO practice at section level
Lane Breakdown AO Cobra
5
Scheme of Maneuver: (Both Iterations)​
Conduct VDO
Clear Suspected Enemy OPs
Conduct Hasty LDA Crossing
Establish SBF​
Determine Assault Positions​
Engage Enemy IVO NAI​
Destroy Enemy IVO NAI​
Posture for Defense on NAI
3
Comments: VDO location will test truck land navigation skills. Too short: Dismounts funnel due to water obstacle
Too Far: Trucks engaged by enemy AT equipped OPs
Hasty VDO is a product of the OP contact
No UAS for this iteration to avoid over reliance

Transition to each Lane:
PLs along with SLs will move with each element to their iterations for concurrency
Graders: Graders will be PSG and WSL of each AO (equipped with copies of T&EO)
Ammo Point: Consisting of SGT Ford and SGT Kuhn on rotation with 2-3 joes of their choosing
Items for the Ammo Point
C-Wire
Tarp
Fire Extinguishers
Pallets Chem Lights and Engineer Tape
Headlamps
08 April Timeline
7
08APR:
1100: SP on GTA 500
1330: Arrive to RZ India
Begin Setup of Staging Area and Patrol Base Locations
1430: Ammo Drop
1500: Lane Recon
1600: Receive The Rest of The Troop at Staging Area
Park Vehicles and move to designated ruck area
Ammo Distro
1645: Lane OIC and NCOIC move to recon objectives
Squads continue their TLPs NLT 1845: Lane OIC and NCOIC return to staging area to listen to OPORDs 1900: Begin OPORD Briefs
2100: SP to OBJ
2300:
